dcterms:creator: H. L. Zhang
J. Baeyens
J. Degrève
G. Cacères
dcterms:description: Thermal images collected over a year from an operational Concentrated Solar Power (CSP) plant, captured at irregular intervals by infrared cameras mounted on solar receivers. The dataset is used for anomaly detection in sequences of thermal images.
dcterms:title: Thermal Images from CSP Plant

dcterms:description: A simulated dataset generated to ensure reproducibility and validation of results, created using a variational autoencoder.
dcterms:title: Simulated Dataset
